metadata.name: "Universe Experiencing Itself"
metadata.description:
"Some part of our being knows this is where we came from. We long to return. And we can. Because the cosmos is also within us. We're made of star-stuff. We are a way for the cosmos to know itself"

-Carl Sagan-

This artwork was created in 2018 with ink and watercolors on a 33x24 centimeters paper.
Then it was animated as a gif and minted as NFT in the "Dec-art Pantheon collection"
